name: @vidaxl/cowlog
description: Eyecachig logging library for development purposes

scripts.test: npm run build; git branch && node_modules/nyc/bin/nyc.js --reporter=lcov --reporter=clover --reporter=text node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha tests && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js; ls -lah; ls -lah coverage;mkdir -p build/logs/;cp -r coverage/*.xml build/logs/; ls -lah;
scripts.build: rm -rf dist;mkdir dist;node_modules/babel-cli/bin/babel.js src --presets babel-preset-es2015 --out-dir dist

author: Imre Toth
